Section.Label: Chapter_Functionality_Section_Methods
Section.Heading: Methods

ManSection.Description: The argument of this category is any permutation group, G. Checks whether G is a regular rooted tree group.
The argument of this attribute is any regular rooted tree group, G.
The argument of this attribute is any regular rooted tree group, G.

ManSection.Returns: The regular rooted tree group G as an object of the category , with attributes and .
ManSection.Description: The arguments of this operation are a regular rooted tree group, G, and its degree k and depth n.
The argument of this property is any regular rooted tree group, G. Tests whether G satisfies the self-replicating conditions.
The argument of this property is any regular rooted tree group, G. Tests whether G has sufficient rigid automorphisms.

ManSection.Returns: The image of G when projected onto the automorphism group of degree k and depth n-1.
ManSection.Description: The argument of this attribute is any regular rooted tree group, G, of degree k and depth n.

ManSection.Returns: The maximal extension of G, M(G), that is a subgroup of the automorphism group of degree k and depth n+1.
ManSection.Description: The argument of this attribute is any regular rooted tree group, G, of degree k and depth n.

ManSection.Returns: A conjugate of G with sufficient rigid automorphisms.
ManSection.Description: The argument of this attribute is any regular rooted tree group, G.

Section.Label: Chapter_Functionality_Section_Library_Functions
Section.Heading: Library Functions

ManSection.Returns: All of the self-replicating group(s) stored as objects satisfying all of the provided input arguments.
ManSection.Description: Main library search function. Has several possible input arguments such as Degree, Level (or Depth), Number, Projection, Subgroup, Size, NumberOfGenerators, and IsAbelian. Order of the inputs do not matter.

ManSection.Returns: Information about the self-replicating group(s) satisfying all of the provided input arguments in list form: [Generators, Name, Parent Name, Children Name(s)]. If the Position input is provided, only the corresponding index of this list is returned.
ManSection.Description: Inputs work the same as the main library search function , with one additional input: Position.

ManSection.Returns: All of the degrees currently stored in the SRGroups library (duplicates included).
ManSection.Description: There are no inputs to this function.

ManSection.Returns: All of the levels currently stored in the SRGroups library for an input RegularRootedTreeGroupDegree, deg.
ManSection.Description: The input to this function is the degree of the regular rooted tree, k.

ManSection.Returns: The regular rooted tree group \mathrm{Aut}(T_{k,n}) as a permutation group of the k^{n} leaves of T_{k,n}.
ManSection.Description: The arguments of this function are a degree k \in\mathbb{N}_{\ge 2} and a depth n \in\mathbb{N}.

ManSection.Returns: The restriction of aut to the subtree below the level 1 vertex i, as an element of AutT(k,n-1).
ManSection.Description: The arguments of this function are a degree, k \in\mathbb{N}_{\ge 2}, a depth, n \in\mathbb{N}, an element of AutT(k,n), aut, and a level 1 vertex, i \in\{1,\cdots,k\}.
